enableAgentConfiguration.title: The setting to allow managed users to overwrite managed settings locally on their machine.

enableConfigurableCallerID.title: The setting to allow agents to configure a Caller ID name and number.

searchExternalContacts.title: The setting to search for Genesys Cloud external contacts when making calls or transferring interactions.

defaultOutboundSMSCountryCode.title: A two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) for a default outbound SMS country code.

useSSO.title: The setting to allow users to auto-redirect with SSO
